text.ascii: uttara uvAca
text.ur: uttara uvāca

text.ascii: adyAham anugaccheyaM dRDhadhanvA gavAM padam
text.ur: adyāham anugaccheyaṁ dr̥ḍhadhanvā gavāṁ padam

text.ascii: yadi me sArathiH kaz cid bhaved azveSu kovidaH
text.ur: yadi me sārathiḥ kaś cid bhaved aśveṣu kovidaḥ

text.ascii: tam eva nAdhigacchAmi yo me yantA bhaven naraH
text.ud: तमेव नाधिगच्छामि यो मे यन्ता भवेन्नरः
text.ur: tam eva nādhigacchāmi yo me yantā bhaven naraḥ

text.ascii: pazyadhvaM sArathiM kSipraM mama yuktaM prayAsyataH
text.ud: पश्यध्वं सारथिं क्षिप्रं मम युक्तं प्रयास्यतः
text.ur: paśyadhvaṁ sārathiṁ kṣipraṁ mama yuktaṁ prayāsyataḥ

text.ascii: aSTAviMzatirAtraM vA mAsaM vA nUnam antataH
text.ur: aṣṭāviṁśatirātraṁ vā māsaṁ vā nūnam antataḥ

text.ascii: yat tadAsIn mahad yuddhaM tatra me sArathir hataH
text.ur: yat tadāsīn mahad yuddhaṁ tatra me sārathir hataḥ

text.ascii: sa labheyaM yadi tv anyaM hayayAnavidaM naram
text.ud: स लभेयं यदि त्वन्यं हययानविदं नरम्
text.ur: sa labheyaṁ yadi tv anyaṁ hayayānavidaṁ naram

text.ascii: tvarAvAn adya yAtvAhaM samucchritamahAdhvajam
text.ur: tvarāvān adya yātvāhaṁ samucchritamahādhvajam

text.ascii: vigAhya tat parAnIkaM gajavAjirathAkulam
text.ur: vigāhya tat parānīkaṁ gajavājirathākulam

text.ascii: zastrapratApanirvIryAn kurUJ jitvAnaye pazUn
text.ur: śastrapratāpanirvīryān kurūñ jitvānaye paśūn

text.ascii: duryodhanaM zAMtanavaM karNaM vaikartanaM kRpam
text.ur: duryodhanaṁ śāṁtanavaṁ karṇaṁ vaikartanaṁ kr̥pam

text.ascii: droNaM ca saha putreNa maheSvAsAn samAgatAn
text.ur: droṇaṁ ca saha putreṇa maheṣvāsān samāgatān

text.ascii: vitrAsayitvA saMgrAme dAnavAn iva vajrabhRt
text.ur: vitrāsayitvā saṁgrāme dānavān iva vajrabhr̥t

text.ascii: anenaiva muhUrtena punaH pratyAnaye pazUn
text.ur: anenaiva muhūrtena punaḥ pratyānaye paśūn

text.ascii: zUnyam AsAdya kuravaH prayAnty AdAya godhanam
text.ur: śūnyam āsādya kuravaḥ prayānty ādāya godhanam

text.ascii: kiM nu zakyaM mayA kartuM yad ahaM tatra nAbhavam
text.ud: किं नु शक्यं मया कर्तुं यदहं तत्र नाभवम्
text.ur: kiṁ nu śakyaṁ mayā kartuṁ yad ahaṁ tatra nābhavam

text.ascii: pazyeyur adya me vIryaM kuravas te samAgatAH
text.ur: paśyeyur adya me vīryaṁ kuravas te samāgatāḥ

text.ascii: kiM nu pArtho 'rjunaH sAkSAd ayam asmAn prabAdhate
text.ur: kiṁ nu pārtho ’rjunaḥ sākṣād ayam asmān prabādhate

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: tasya tad vacanaM strISu bhASataH sma punaH punaH
text.ud: तस्य तद्वचनं स्त्रीषु भाषतः स्म पुनः पुनः
text.ur: tasya tad vacanaṁ strīṣu bhāṣataḥ sma punaḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: nAmarSayata pAJcAlI bIbhatsoH parikIrtanam
text.ur: nāmarṣayata pāñcālī bībhatsoḥ parikīrtanam

text.ascii: athainam upasaMgamya strImadhyAt sA tapasvinI
text.ur: athainam upasaṁgamya strīmadhyāt sā tapasvinī

text.ascii: vrIDamAneva zanakair idaM vacanam abravIt
text.ur: vrīḍamāneva śanakair idaṁ vacanam abravīt

text.ascii: yo 'sau bRhadvAraNAbho yuvA supriyadarzanaH
text.ur: yo ’sau br̥hadvāraṇābho yuvā supriyadarśanaḥ

text.ascii: bRhannaDeti vikhyAtaH pArthasyAsIt sa sArathiH
text.ur: br̥hannaḍeti vikhyātaḥ pārthasyāsīt sa sārathiḥ

text.ascii: dhanuSy anavaraz cAsIt tasya ziSyo mahAtmanaH
text.ur: dhanuṣy anavaraś cāsīt tasya śiṣyo mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: dRSTapUrvo mayA vIra carantyA pANDavAn prati
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭapūrvo mayā vīra carantyā pāṇḍavān prati

text.ascii: yadA tat pAvako dAvam adahat khANDavaM mahat
text.ur: yadā tat pāvako dāvam adahat khāṇḍavaṁ mahat

text.ascii: arjunasya tadAnena saMgRhItA hayottamAH
text.ur: arjunasya tadānena saṁgr̥hītā hayottamāḥ

text.ascii: tena sArathinA pArthaH sarvabhUtAni sarvazaH
text.ur: tena sārathinā pārthaḥ sarvabhūtāni sarvaśaḥ

text.ascii: ajayat khANDavaprasthe na hi yantAsti tAdRzaH
text.ur: ajayat khāṇḍavaprasthe na hi yantāsti tādr̥śaḥ

text.ascii: yeyaM kumArI suzroNI bhaginI te yavIyasI
text.ud: येयं कुमारी सुश्रोणी भगिनी ते यवीयसी
text.ur: yeyaṁ kumārī suśroṇī bhaginī te yavīyasī

text.ascii: asyAH sa vacanaM vIra kariSyati na saMzayaH
text.ud: अस्याः स वचनं वीर करिष्यति न संशयः
text.ur: asyāḥ sa vacanaṁ vīra kariṣyati na saṁśayaḥ

text.ascii: yadi vai sArathiH sa syAt kurUn sarvAn asaMzayam
text.ur: yadi vai sārathiḥ sa syāt kurūn sarvān asaṁśayam

text.ascii: jitvA gAz ca samAdAya dhruvam AgamanaM bhavet
text.ur: jitvā gāś ca samādāya dhruvam āgamanaṁ bhavet

text.ascii: evam uktaH sa sairandhryA bhaginIM pratyabhASata
text.ur: evam uktaḥ sa sairandhryā bhaginīṁ pratyabhāṣata

text.ascii: gaccha tvam anavadyAGgi tAm Anaya bRhannaDAm
text.ur: gaccha tvam anavadyāṅgi tām ānaya br̥hannaḍām

text.ascii: sA bhrAtrA preSitA zIghram agacchan nartanAgRham
text.ur: sā bhrātrā preṣitā śīghram agacchan nartanāgr̥ham

text.ascii: yatrAste sa mahAbAhuz channaH satreNa pANDavaH
text.ur: yatrāste sa mahābāhuś channaḥ satreṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
